title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. If the student draws two types of circles with the same shading, one small and one large, the small circles can be interpreted as Ca 2+ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E25@ ions and the large circles can be interpreted as Cl âˆ’ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D80@ ions.

title: Part (b)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that the charged ions are attracted to polar water molecules or that the positive and negative ions are attracted to the water molecules, which have positive and negative ends.
The response indicates that the charged ions are attracted to polar water molecules OR that the positive and negative ions are attracted to the water molecules, which have positive and negative ends.
